title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.45 - Operator of helicopter must be certificated
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.45 - Operator of helicopter must be certificated

State Regulations

In the case of helicopters, only certificated
helicopter pilots shall attend the controls and no helicopter shall be left
running when there is not a certificated helicopter pilot or certificated A and
P mechanic at the controls. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1261.45

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
